ZERGLING hears all the commotion through the com link about the
attack 
on the alliance base. He runs for the base getting ready to attack. 
"beast mode" ZERGLING runs infront of the alliance base. "Transform" 
He attacks hades with his bow like sword gun. He slashes at hades 
about two or three times.
